basics.name: environmentName
basics.label: Environment Name
basics.toolTip: Name of the environment which is used to generate a short unique hash used in all resources.

constraints.validationMessage: Environment name must be 1-64 characters long and contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens.

basics.name: principalId
basics.label: Azure AD Object ID (Optional - for development only)
basics.toolTip: Your Azure AD Object ID for local development access. Get it via: az ad signed-in-user show --query id -o tsv. Leave empty for production.

constraints.validationMessage: Must be empty or a valid GUID
